Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Patrol Member', 3: "There's an abandoned town 12 kilometers north along the riverâ€”the same location listed in the patrol team's routine report last week.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Patrol Member', 3: "We're short on people, and the water collection team gets the vehicles first, so we haven't gotten the supplies yet.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Emma', 3: "If I remember right, the report didn't mention any Mutated Red Tide activity?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Patrol Member', 3: "Yeah, it's an abandoned town. We scanned it and found a lot of protective gear, purification devices, and weapons and ammunition inside.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Patrol Member', 3: "They probably didn't have time to evacuate...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Across this destroyed land, the same sad stories repeat.'}
{2: "Rosa's list said we'd need some water purifiers.", 3: '17'}
{3: "Since you're on patrol, you now have time to venture deeper into the ruined city to search for the materials Rosa mentioned that are in short supply at Aerospace City."}
{3: 'With a light reconnaissance vehicle, you can cover ten kilometers across the flat land easily.'}
{3: 'About twenty minutes from camp, you see buildings in the distance.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Emma', 3: 'Not bad... The Punishing Virus is still low here. We should be able to find something useful.', 4: '18'}
{3: "The vehicle's treads crunch over gravel and ice, sending a crackling sound and vibrations from beneath the driver's seat straight into your ears."}
{3: "The town's image in your eyes turns into more details."}
{3: 'The buildings in the distance suddenly look like hazy gray clouds, and the horizon below them wavers.'}
{3: "The ground under the town curves upward, like someone's playing with a sandcastle."}
{3: 'A dark red flood pours from the sky, swallowing the gray mass before joining the chaotic horizon.'}
{3: 'You try to speak, but the desperate urge to speak drowns in the airless depths of your throat.'}
{3: "Like a nightmare, you can't even make a sound."}
{3: "Your mouth opens wide, and your cheeks hurt from trying to speak, but it's all in vain."}
{3: 'The brown and white land is gone. Under the sky, nothing can stop the red wave.'}
{3: "But under your feet are rocky reefs, with strangely shaped algae and coral growing through the cracks, like they're hungry for nourishment."}
{2: '(Is this... the bottom of the ocean?)', 3: '78', 8: '2'}
{3: 'A chill runs down your back as old fears start to surface.'}
